title: Random Disconnect
body: Okay so this is unfortunate but the league client keeps randomly disconnecting my team and myself from chat and then from the game entirely and did actually cause a dodge timer for a team mate of mine. Is there anything on this?

replies.body: Yeah, this is pretty frustrating.  :(  I'm sorry that you're going through all that, and I'd like to help!  Overall it does sound like your connection is specifically running into a lot of snags trying to reach our services.  You should hop into custom games for now, and go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help resolve this.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Yeah... ever since they did the mini update today I've been disconnecting every 3-4 minutes.  I can stay connected to everything else including PUBG, Overwatch, HoTS, Minecraft etc. however my service to the **game client** drops while the out of game client/launcher seems to be fine.  So I'm forced to leave and reconnect which takes all of literally 10 seconds but sometimes that's huge in a game.
